mapper.select: select str.ymd as date, sum(p.price * str.out_qty) as sales from store_stock_report str join product p on str.product_id = p.id where str.user_store_id = #{userStoreId} group by ymd having ymd >= DATE_FORMAT(#{yearMonth}, '%Y-%m-01') and ymd <= LAST_DAY(#{yearMonth}) order by ymd;

select (select name category_id from category where id = p.category_id) as categoryName, sum(p.price * str.out_qty) as sales from store_stock_report str join product p on str.product_id = p.id where user_store_id = #{userStoreId} and ymd >= DATE_FORMAT(#{yearMonth}, '%Y-%m-01') and ymd <= LAST_DAY(#{yearMonth}) group by p.category_id;
